hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition Warning via Solana Memecoin Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: In BULL regimes, when SOL price makes a new 10-day high but its leading memecoin (PEPE or DOGE) fails to confirm with a lower high and shows declining social volume, the BULL regime will deteriorate to NEUTRAL within 7 trading days with >75% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins typically exhibit maximum retail euphoria at bull market peaks. Their early divergence from major L1s (SOL) signals waning speculative momentum before institutional flows reverse. This provides early warning for regime transition.
entry_conditions: PEPE or DOGE price <previous swing high (3-day lookback)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: PEPE/DOGE breaks to new highs with expanding social volume

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BULL regime continues >7 days after signal OR memecoins subsequently lead market higher in >25% of cases.
